item.description:
This isn't exactly a hike, more of a stroll along the old towpath for the Windsor Locks Canal, but it's a nice walk with lovely views of the Connecticut River. The towpath is 4.5 miles long, but we probably won't go that far since we have to turn around and retrace our steps back to the parking lot!

To get there from I-91, take Route 190 west. Turn left (south) on Route 159 and take the first left (only .1 mile) onto Canal Road. At the end of Canal Road there is a state maintained parking lot and the northern end of the path.

For anyone who's interested in a bite to eat afterwards, we have our choice of several restaurants back across the river in Enfield.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Stroll along the Windsor Locks Canal
